title: Spawn Rules
description: Data-Driven spawning allows you to adjust the spawn conditions of mobs.

minecraft:spawn_rules.title: Spawn Rules
minecraft:spawn_rules.description: Data-Driven spawning allows you to adjust the spawn conditions of mobs.

description.title: Description
description.description: The descripton of to which entity this spawn rule belongs.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The entity identifier this spawn rule will apply to, entity must exist.

population_control.title: Population Control
population_control.description: Setting an entity to a pool it will spawn as long as that pool hasn't reached the spawn limit.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

G.title: Subject
G.description: The subject of this filter test.

E.title: Clock Time
E.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

test.title: Test Property
test.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

H.title: Distance To Nearest Player
H.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

I.title: Has Ability
I.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

J.title: Has Biome Tag
J.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

BA.title: Has Component
BA.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

value.description: (Required) The component name to look for.
value.title: Value

BB.title: Has Container Open
BB.description: Returns true when the subject Player entity has opened a container.

BD.title: Entity Damage Source
BD.description: The types of damage an entity can receive.

BC.title: Has Damage
BC.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type. has_damage can also use subject and operator parameters but they are optional.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type.

BE.title: Has Equipment
BE.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

BG.title: Has Mob Effect
BG.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

BH.title: Has Equipment
BH.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

BI.title: Has Ranged Weapon
BI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is holding a ranged weapon like a bow or crossbow.

BJ.title: Has Silk Touch
BJ.description: Tests if the subject is holding an item with silk touch.

CA.title: Has Tag
CA.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

CB.title: Has Target
CB.description: Returns true if the subject entity has a valid target.

CC.title: Has Trade Supply
CC.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

CD.title: Hourly Clock Time
CD.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

value.description: (Required) An integer value set between 0 and 24000.
value.title: Value

CE.title: In Block
CE.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

CF.title: In Caravan
CF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

CG.title: In Clouds
CG.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

CH.title: In Contact With Water
CH.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

CI.title: In Lava
CI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

CJ.title: In Nether
CJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Nether.

DA.title: In Water Or Rain
DA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

DB.title: In Water
DB.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

DC.title: Inactivity Timer
DC.description: Tests if the specified duration in seconds of inactivity for despawning has been reached.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

DD.title: Is Altitude
DD.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

DE.title: Is Avoiding Mobs
DE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

DF.title: Is Biome
DF.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

DG.title: Is Block
DG.description: Returns true when the block has the given name.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

DH.title: Is Brightness
DH.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

value.description: The brightness value to compare with.
value.title: Value

DI.title: Is Climbing
DI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

DJ.title: Is Color
DJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

EA.title: Is Daytime
EA.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

EB.title: Is Difficulty
EB.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

value.description: The game's difficulty level to test.
value.title: Value

EC.title: Is Family
EC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

ED.title: Is Game Rule
ED.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.

value.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.
value.title: Value

EE.title: Is Humid
EE.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

EF.title: Is Immobile
EF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is immobile. An entity is immobile if it lacks AI goals, has just changed dimensions or if it is a mob and has no health.

EG.title: Is In Village
EG.description: Tests whether the Subject is inside the bounds of a village.

EH.title: Is Leashed To
EH.description: Returns true if the subject entity leashed to the calling entity.

EI.title: Is Leashed
EI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is leashed.

EJ.title: Is Mark Variant
EJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the mark variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

FA.title: In Nether
FA.description: Tests if the subject is not at full health.

FB.title: Is Moving
FB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is moving.

FC.title: Is Owner
FC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the owner of the calling entity.

FD.title: Is Persistent
FD.description: Tests if the subject's persistence matches the bool value passed in.

FE.title: Is Riding
FE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding on another entity.

FF.title: Is Skin Id
FF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the skin id number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

FG.title: Is Sleeping
FG.description: Tests whether the Subject is sleeping.

FH.title: Is Sneaking
FH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sneaking.

FI.title: Is Snow Covered
FI.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with snow cover.

FJ.title: Is Target
FJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the target of the calling entity.

GA.title: Is Target
GA.description: Tests whether the current temperature is a given type.

value.description: The Biome temperature catagory to test.
value.title: Value

GB.title: Is Temperature Value
GB.description: Tests the current temperature against a provided value in the range (0.0, 1.0) where 0.0f is the coldest temp and 1.0f is the hottest.

value.description: The Biome temperature value to compare with.
value.title: Value

GC.title: Is Underground
GC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is underground. An entity is considered underground if there are non-solid blocks above it.

GD.title: Is Underwater
GD.description: Returns true when the subject entity is under water. An entity is considered underwater if it is completely submerged in water blocks.

GE.title: Is Variant
GE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

GF.title: Is Visible
GF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is visible.

GG.title: Is Waterlogged
GG.description: Tests if the subject block is submerged in water.

GH.title: Light Level
GH.description: Tests is the mob is outside of the specified light level range (0, 16).

GI.title: Moon Intensity
GI.description: Compares the current moon intensity with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0)

GJ.title: Moon Phase
GJ.description: Compares the current moon phase with an integer value in the range (0, 7).

HA.title: On Ground
HA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on ground.

HB.title: On Ladder
HB.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on a ladder.

HC.title: Random Chance
HC.description: Returns true if the random chance rolls 0 out of a specified Maximum range.

HD.title: Rider Count
HD.description: Returns the number of riders on this entity.

HE.title: Surface Mob
HE.description: Tests if the subject is a surface mob.

HF.title: Trusts
HF.description: Returns true if the subject is trusted by entity.

HG.title: Weather At Position
HG.description: Tests the current weather, at the actor's position, against a provided weather value.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

HH.title: Weather
HH.description: Tests for the current weather state the entity is experiencing.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

min.description: This is the minimum light level value that allows the mob to spawn.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum light level value that allows the mob to spawn.
max.title: Max

adjust_for_weather.description: This determines if weather can affect the light level conditions that cause the mob to spawn (e.g. Allowing hostile mobs to spawn during the day when it rains.)
adjust_for_weather.title: Adjust For Weather

surface.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable on the surface.
surface.title: Surface

underground.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable underground.
underground.title: Underground

min.description: This is the minimum difficulty level that a mob spawns.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum difficulty level that a mob spawns.
max.title: Max

IF.title: Entity Types
IF.description: entity_types is a specific type of JSON object used by Minecraft: Bedrock Edition in order to encapsulate entity data that can be used in certain behaviors and components..

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid.

max_dist.title: Maximum Distance
max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice.

must_see.title: Must See
must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice.

must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration
must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more.

sprint_speed_multiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.

walk_speed_multiplier.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.

min_size.description: This is the minimum number of mobs that spawn in a herd.
min_size.title: Minimum Size

max_size.description: This is the maximum number of mobs that spawn in a herd.
max_size.title: Maximum Size

event.description: This is an event that can be triggered from spawning.
event.title: Event

event_skip_count.description: This is the number of mobs spawned before the specified event is triggered.
event_skip_count.title: Event Skip Count

IH.title: Mob Event Filter
IH.description: This component allows players to spawn mobs on a particular event..

event_filter.description: The event String in this JSON Object is used to filter the spawn rules of the mob type. Can be type minecraft:pillager_patrols_event, minecraft:wandering_trader_event, or minecraft:ender_dragon_event..
event_filter.title: Event Filter
